dcterms:description: A large-scale mmWave human body dataset with paired RGBD images in various environments, including extreme weather conditions like fog, rain, and night, aimed at facilitating research on combining mmWave radars with RGBD cameras for 3D body reconstruction.
dcterms:title: mmBody
